metadata.description: The Melter; The Executioner; The Enchantress; Egghead; Big Zero and Coat of Arms: they call themselves the Young Avengers, teenage rebels, on the run from the authorities, hated and feared by a world they've sworn to protect. Their interests include interspecies romance, modern art and bloody murder. Until they meet the original Young Avengers.
metadata.name: Dark Reign: Young Avengers, Vol. 1
